column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For the entrees the steaks were both very good
column2: though my ribeye was sadly undercooked.  I requested medium rare
column3: and it was much closer to blue or very rare
column5: but for a ribeye it definitely would have been better cooked to at least a rare
column6: not to mention cooking a steak properly should be kind of second nature to this place.  The filet
column7: was cooked perfectly however.  Both were very flavorful
column8: served with extra seasoning that is not needed at all.  My only complaint is that we've had better steak at much lower price points
column9: and the sides and hor d'oeuvres seemed to out-shine the main entrees.  (except for that horrible sweet potato)
